title: Video of Police Beating Black Music Producer Roils France
sub_head: Government plans to appoint commission to review bill restricting publication of images of law enforcers
body:
PARISâ€”A video of French police officers beating a Black music producer has pushed the government of President Emmanuel Macron to consider revising legislation that seeks to restrict people from publishing images of security forces.
The French news website Loopsider posted footage Thursday from a security camera inside the Paris music studio of Michel Zecler that shows three police officers punching the man and striking him with a baton. The video, which was recorded Saturday, then shows tear gas being deployed inside the music...
